metadata.title: CVE-2018-7183 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Buffer overflow in the decodearr function in ntpq in ntp 4.2.8p6 through4.2.8p10 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by leveraging anntpq query and sending a response with a crafted array.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7183` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ntp - 1:4.2.8p4+dfsg-3ubuntu5.9
ntpdate - 1:4.2.8p4+dfsg-3ubuntu5.9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ntp package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:4.2.8p4+dfsg-3ubuntu5.9').
